name: Harris
desc: Harris is a chef, and he built the camp near Dragonspine to provide food for the adventurers.

imgDesc.text: Windwail Highland: Adventurers' Camp at the entrance to Dragonspine

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
The thought of burning stoves and freshly cooked food is comforting indeed, but a chef can't be cooking all the time, nor is an adventurer's appetite without limit! Filling the gaps between meals with exciting Genius Invokation TCG duels is another good way to stay warm in the mountains...
<color=#ccbfad>Special Rule: Your Support Zone starts with 1 "Xudong" card.</color>
<color=#ccbfad>Hint: When Xudong is on the field, you can spend 2 less Elemental Dice to play a Food Card each Round!</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Rhodeia of Loch
customize.desc:
"Lady of Clear Waters" Rhodeia

"As long as rain falls and rivers flow… water will exist forever…"

customize.name: Fischl
customize.desc:
"Fischl, Prinzessin der Verurteilung!" Fischl

"Oz, mine familiar, spread thine wings and weave for me a new fate in the gloom of this night!"

"Mein Fräulein, you cannot expect me to fetch you a replacement card…"

customize.name: Stonehide Lawachurl
customize.desc:
"Vale-Crosser" Stonehide Lawachurl

Go around — the way ahead is the realm of the "king."

customize.name: Yelan
customize.desc:
"Valley Orchid" Yelan

The world is vast and infinite, the solitary one comes and goes as she pleases.

customize.name: Sucrose
customize.desc:
"Harmless Sweetie" Sucrose

"You can't rate the strength of an as-yet untested deck!"

customize.name: Hu Tao
customize.desc:
"Fragrance in Thaw" Hu Tao

"Send one, send 'em all!"

customize.name: Turn Control
customize.desc:
Yelan: Turn Control

"Things are about to get dicey."

customize.name: Primordial Jade Winged-Spear
customize.desc:
Eagle Spear of Justice: Primordial Jade Winged-Spear

"The stone bird took to the unbound skies once forged. Into the heart of the ocean it dove, into the battlefield with the behemoth and the whale. Into the depths of the sea the behemoth sank, there to stay forever. Released from its thundering roars were the people of Liyue."

customize.name: Primordial Jade Winged-Spear
customize.desc:
Eagle Spear of Justice: Primordial Jade Winged-Spear

"The stone bird took to the unbound skies once forged. Into the heart of the ocean it dove, into the battlefield with the behemoth and the whale. Into the depths of the sea the behemoth sank, there to stay forever. Released from its thundering roars were the people of Liyue."

customize.name: Chef Mao
customize.desc:
Chef Mao, Ingenious Gourmet

"We just concern ourselves with making the most delicious food imaginable using everyday ingredients, universally loved flavors, and truly excellent cooking."

customize.name: Chef Mao
customize.desc:
Chef Mao, Ingenious Gourmet

"We just concern ourselves with making the most delicious food imaginable using everyday ingredients, universally loved flavors, and truly excellent cooking."

customize.name: Xudong
customize.desc:
Fulfillment First: Xudong

"Hmm? A problem. Agh. We can deal with it after we finish eating."

customize.name: NRE
customize.desc:
Emergency Intake: Portable Dish

"Regular nutrition helps in case of physical exertion."

customize.name: Adeptus' Temptation
customize.desc:
Adeptus' Temptation

It is said that this name was derived from this dish's ability to tempt an adeptus to return to the mortal realm. But that begs the question… Which adeptus was that?

customize.name: Lotus Flower Crisp
customize.desc:
Lotus Flower Crisp

Dough is formed into bud-like shapes and placed into a pot of oil as if upon the surface of a lake, causing them to slowly bloom layer by layer… A pleasing sight indeed.

customize.name: Lotus Flower Crisp
customize.desc:
Lotus Flower Crisp

Dough is formed into bud-like shapes and placed into a pot of oil as if upon the surface of a lake, causing them to slowly bloom layer by layer… A pleasing sight indeed.

customize.name: Mushroom Pizza
customize.desc:
Mushroom Pizza

They say that a researcher once used very precise calculations to uncover the "fairest way to cut pizza," but as the process is far too bothersome, basically no one uses it…

customize.name: Teyvat Fried Egg
customize.desc:
Teyvat Fried Egg

With a taste of the summer sun, it invigorates you from the first bite.

Take care to eat this meal slowly, and avoid choking the throat of destiny when impelled by the fullness of life's vitality.

customize.name: Teyvat Fried Egg
customize.desc:
Teyvat Fried Egg

With a taste of the summer sun, it invigorates you from the first bite.

Take care to eat this meal slowly, and avoid choking the throat of destiny when impelled by the fullness of life's vitality.

customize.name: Tandoori Roast Chicken
customize.desc:
Tandoori Roast Chicken

The chicken and spices are capable of performing a mysterious Sumeru dance on the tip of your tongue, evoking the image of a festive banquet...

But even a dish so delicious has its last bite, and every feast has its end.

customize.name: Tandoori Roast Chicken

customize.name: Butter Crab
customize.desc:
Butter Crab

The butter-infused crab legs have a rich aroma that washes over the taste buds so seductively that none can resist its allure.

"Another helping, please!"

customize.name: Butter Crab
customize.desc:
Butter Crab

"Another helping, please!"

customize.name: Fish and Chips
customize.desc:
Fish and Chips

Fish fried until golden and crispy, with chips and a smorgasbord of sauces. Every single bite is suffused with savory satisfaction...

customize.name: Fish and Chips
customize.desc:
Fish and Chips

customize.name: Player EXP
customize.desc: Obtained by winning Genius Invokation TCG matches. Every duel you won builds upon the paths to victory, such is the act of earning experience itself. To know how to overcome and subdue the adversary in any situation is the greatest strength that a player can possess.

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.text: <color=#ffffffd9>Achieve victory with characters defeated less than twice during the battle</color>

customize.name: Radish Veggie Soup
customize.desc: Radish-based vegetable soup. Its flavor is delicately between tart and sweet. With luscious radish, it's a well-balanced dish.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: Steak
customize.desc: A grilled steak. High heat has locked the juices in, giving one high expectations for when the meat is cut open.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: Jewelry Soup
customize.desc: A simple vegetable soup. Snapdragon, tofu, and lotus seeds are put into boiling water and simmered. Jewelry Soup earned its luxurious name from the look of the ingredients used, but contrary to its name, the soup is commonly prepared and served in ordinary households.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.
